code: import Apis,{endpoints}from'../configs/App';export var getAllRentRequestFromTenant=function getAllRentRequestFromTenant(access_token){return console.error(error);});};export var getAllConfirmRequestFromTenant=function getAllConfirmRequestFromTenant(access_token){return reject_rent_request(id,access_token){return Apis.get(endpoints['reject_rent_request'](id),{headers:{"Authorization":"Bearer ".concat(access_token)}}).then(function(response){return editRentRequest(id,data,access_token){var formData=new FormData();formData.append("message",data.message);return Apis.patch(endpoints['rent_request-detail'](id),formData,{headers:{"Authorization":"Bearer ".concat(access_token)}}).then(function(response){return response;}).catch(function(error){return
